Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Comfortably \Com"fort*a*bly\, adv. In a comfortable or comforting manner. [1913 Webster]
Speak ye comfortably to Jerusalem. --Is. xl. 2. [1913 Webster]

comfortably adv 1: in mental comfort; without stress; "he works comfortably on three continents" 2: in physical comfort; "she could have been lying comfortably in bed getting the same relief" [ant: {uncomfortably}] 3: in financial comfort; "They live well"; "she has been able to live comfortably since her husband died" [syn: {well}]
